snippet.title: Purpose: VERSUS (& VERSA) | Teaser #1
snippet.description:
First teaser for the cinematic trailer I'm about to release in 7 days (November 8th 2020) so mark your calendars!

You can watch the whole trailer early by becoming a patron (Pre-Alpha & Behind The Scenes tier) and joining the Purpose: Versus Discord server to watch it there!
(Links below)

https://flow.page/projectpurpose

**For those who are new here, Purpose: VERSUS is a story driven Action RPG made with the UPBGE 0.3.0 engine. It takes inspiration from popular titles from Square Enix such as the Final Fantasy games, Kingdom Hearts etc. The whole project is solo-developed by Stephen Ddungu (me), and its story runs simultaneously to the story of Purpose: VERSA - The Animation.**

Purpose: VERSA: https://www.youtube.com/PurposeVERSA
